short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the current UK carbon intensity (gCO2/kWh)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the current carbon intensity of electricity generated in the UK. The extension shows a number in the toolbar which is the current carbon intensity as measured in gCO2/kWh.
